projects.title: Master Bounce
projects.description: Master Bounce is a frenetic mobile game with +100 levels of pure adrenaline.#In this game you are in a closed room where there are tons of enemies and you have to protect your base.#Everything is customizable and you can buy a lot of skins just playing the game. All this game was based and load throught Playfab.# My role in this game was Game Programmer, Core Game Architecture, Backend Architecture and Implementation Implementation, Ad Integrations Programmer.

projects.title: Project Blue Book: Hidden Mysteries
projects.description: Project Blue Book The Game: Hidden Mysteries is the official, mobile free-to-play, hidden object adventure game based on HISTORY’s hit drama series PROJECT BLUE BOOK.#My role in this game was Game Programmer, Backend Programmer, Data Analysis, Quests Architecture and Implementation, Item Reward Retention System Implementation.

projects.title: Hobo Fight
projects.description: Hobo fight was born in the Global Game Jam (2019) after the event we continue working on it and it became Indie Prize finalist Los Angeles, USA (2019).#Hobo Fight! is a king of the hill game which allows hobos to fight each other. The more time you spend inside the house, the closer you are to transform it into your home.#In this crazy game, you and your friends become a Hobo, so you can do everything that comes with it...like throwing things, drinking unknown liquids and trying a pair of worn out shoes.

projects.title: The Cave VR
projects.description: The Cave VR is a single player game for cardboard and Samsumg Gear VR. It´s a survival where you need to escape from a danger cave.#The game revolves around the person who has to find the way to escape from this dangerous cave, to do that he needs to hear waters drops and collect chests.#My role for the game was a programmer, I worked on all gameplay mechanics.

projects.title: La Colina
projects.description: La Colina is a 2D tower defense game for mobile. It is a game where you need to protect cows from aliens' attack.#In this game you put different types of cows to protect the queen, harvest milk, shoot to aliens and protect the cows.#My role in this project was programmer, I worked on cow´s mechanics like attacks, move, deaths and interactions with aliens.

projects.title: Taxi Vs Uber
projects.description: Taxis Vs Ubers is a local multiplayer game for Pc. It can play with keyboard or joysticks.#Challenge your friends to know who is the best driver, carry passengers, drive quickly and get a lot of money.#My role in this game was lead developer, I worked on all gameplays mechanics, carry passengers, money, crashes and time.
